post:
So I got 3 keys for the origin platform: The sims 3, high end loft stuff & late night. So 3 codes in total.

I'm selling these 3 keys for either 10$ for them all or small vps/instance :>

I should say that in case someone wants to trade it for a vps, here's what I'm looking for:
128-512mb ram
5gb disk (ssd preferred)
150gb bandie

I'd personally prefer it if when offering a plan with a lower amount of ram, to offer an extended period of usage if possible (I rather have a 128mb instance running for a year)
